question: Can you help me find the nutritional information for quinoa salad and generate an image of a quinoa salad?
true_answer: Nutritional information for quinoa salad: approximately 220 calories per serving, 8g protein, 4g fat, 36g carbohydrates. Image of a quinoa salad generated.

What are some common ingredients in quinoa salad?
Plan: 1) Search for common ingredients in quinoa salad. 2) Provide additional information.
Searching for common ingredients in quinoa salad.
Common ingredients include quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olive oil, lemon juice, and fresh herbs.
